bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: UI - histogram listener and /train location cause backend errors
bug.description: Histogram listener defers to a subset of the StatsListener. However, if the user goes to /train instead of /weights, they will encounter a bunch of errors due to missing data. Using histogram listener + /weights, or stats listener + /train (i.e., the intended use case) work fine.

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
